After finally having uninstalled this game, I realized that in the long run, this game is just a pain in the ass. It is definitely pay to win, considering how op some killers are. The developers dont give a damn about our wishes, such as the following:
 - Matchmaking is horrible with friends, we cant even start a fucking game
- After vaulting, being 4-5 meters away from the killer you still get hit somehow
- Gen rushing hasnt been solved
- We recently encountered a bug which hit my guy though a locker
- The ranks are horribly mixed together and thus making matches unfair
- I dont see any point or rationality in reseting ones rank
- Why so many dlcs and no fixes??

The positives
-The maps are quite cool sometimes
- Wide selection of slasher movie killers and from other horror movies

很不错的游戏，为什么不错，你体验过绝望的感觉吗？压迫感？鼓起勇气，你就是那个在绝望中寻求希望逃生者。
生活顺利吗？梦想总是会被现实击倒吗？你只是还需时间的考验罢了，努力向前，做为一名杀手，适当的发泄一下，也许会更加有动力面对生活。但请记住，无论是逃生者还是杀手，只有合作才能取得胜利，只有学会奉献，才能赢得人生的价值

Игра интерестная,поиграть стоить,есть свои костюмы,маньяки и выжившие.Правда есть 1 минус это - Дисбаланс.Ведь на 20 рангах может залететь фулл кровавый маньяк и у выживших нет шансор,тоже самое и с выжившими,могут залететь токсик тим на 20 - 15 рангах и у маньяка теперь не будет шансов.
А так Игра в принципе достойна для покупки. Есть конечно баги но Разработчики не плюнули на ДБД и каждый раз выходят обновы с фиксами.

TL/DR: Lobby Simulator game that is unbalanced in a lot of aspects, is easy to hack and get away with it, and has a toxic community. I do recommend the game if you have a thick skin, have excellent patience, and are only looking to play casually, because the game is not worth the effort or stress otherwise.


This is a fun game when you actually get into a game. The wait times are absolutely ridiculous, especially for killer. And when you finally get into a game, some one's game disconnects and then you're back at square one again. It's an endless loop of Lobby Simulator and it's an absolute waste of time. If you get this game, make sure you have something else to do while you wait for a match because it will be a while. And many times, even when you do get in a game, it will disconnect you half way through and basically waste your time even more because you don't get the points.

The game has so much potential to be great, and it can be pretty fun when you can actually get into matches, but I can't recommend it in it's current state until the developers fix this game. There is just so much wrong with it. I only play it with friends now because at least then I can talk to someone and be entertained while we sit in a lobbies for 20 minutes at a time.
Perhaps one day, they will fix it up and it will not be such a pain


EDIT: June 8, 2022

 After a year long break from the game, I come back to many changes to the game. I can see that things have gotten worse overall since my last review. 

The addition of boons could have been a fun idea, but was executed wrong. I'm a survivor main that plays killer sometimes too, but even I can see that the boons are bad in this state. If a hex totem is used once per game and can't be put back up again, then that respect should be given to boons, as it is its survivor equivalent. The fact that snuffing doesn't break the totem AND survivors can put it back up multiple times makes NO SENSE. 

I see that there is a new MMR system that everyone hates. I see why.

The community has a lot of toxicity. More than I remember, which I didn't think was possible lol.

Lobby times are still long as heck, but seem slightly better than before maybe? 

The game is ridiculously easy to hack apparently and the anti-cheat system is bad, according to the community. Watched videos on this topic that basically say that subtle hacking is rampant because of how easy it is to hack this game and that it's near impossible to get hackers banned.

Bloodpoints and shards are being given out in bulk for free constantly in an attempt to keep the community from being angry, I guess? And the game goes on sale for $8 now instead of $10 which could also be something to think about in terms of quality. Not saying that it is a direct correlation, but it's just something that I noticed.

On a good note, it seems to be more optimized now I think with a newer and smoother looking graphics update.


I'd say, if you were to get this game, you need have thick skin and just play casually without any want or need to win. If you take this game too seriously, it will mess with you, because in the end, it is an unbalanced, hacked, and toxic game. 

Have a nice day everyone <3
I like this game, but I fell like something is need it to be better. But, I have fun with my fans in facebook :D Fallow me at: Yo Soy Tony XD in facebook!
Kind of a trash game but so much damn fun

This game is a very love hate relationship. Go into the game with the understanding that at times the game will feel unfair, people will get salty and flame. But it is not so bad, the community is better than it once was. It has a real potential to be fun and enjoyable. Especially when you play kill your friends. That mode is very fun as long as you all remember its a game and you're playing for fun. Not to dominate and destroy your opponent. Honestly if you can bring that mind set into the game outside of Kill your Friends, you will have a lot of fun.

Very simple game to learn and play.  I've been playing it for a week and feel that it was worth the purchase.  The matches are short and tend to be 2-15 minutes long. 

The more you play,  the more you level up your character. They gain abilities and can purchase items with points gained from playing matches. Even losing a match you gain points where you can level up,  so in a way,  you don't really lose.  You are penalized for losing a match. Some of my highest scoring matches were matches I died in.

I play with a controller and like it.  I haven't tried with keyboard and mouse,  but it is possible.
